医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于 CRISPR 的快速分子诊断开发用于两种形式的白血病丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员创建了一种基于 CRISPR 的快速分子诊断方法，用于诊断由涉及基因融合的突变驱动的两种形式的白血病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/CRISPR-based-rapid-molecular-diagnostic-development-for-two-forms-of-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/CRISPR-based-rapid-molecular-diagnostic-development-for-two-forms-of-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341fafaa-bc56-40e5-a2dc-a2a2ef24b3a8 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:45:05 -0400 CRISPR-based rapid molecular diagnostic developed for two forms of leukemia
研究揭示人工智能对父母寻求医疗保健信息的影响堪萨斯大学寿命研究所的新研究强调了人工智能产生的错误信息的一个关键漏洞以及对抗它的潜在模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Research-reveals-AIs-influence-on-parents-seeking-health-care-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Research-reveals-AIs-influence-on-parents-seeking-health-care-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ba8c215-d941-48a5-b159-245fefa4bfb8 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:40:25 -0400 Research reveals AI's influence on parents seeking health care information
在妊娠晚期胎盘中检测到酒精对胚胎发育的影响Pr 领导的一项新研究。 CHU Sainte-Justine 研究员、蒙特利尔大学教授 Serge McGraw 表示，在胚胎植入子宫之前，酒精暴露对胚胎的影响可以在妊娠晚期胎盘中检测到。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Alcohols-effects-on-embryo-development-Detected-in-late-gestation-placenta.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Alcohols-effects-on-embryo-development-Detected-in-late-gestation-placenta.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee1c559-792c-468a-90c1-f62bb824faee Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:36:10 -0400 Alcohol's effects on embryo development detected in late-gestation placenta
研究阐明膀胱癌的起源和进展威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约基因组中心的研究人员领导的一项研究前所未有地阐明了膀胱癌的起源和发展过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-Illuminates-the-origin-and-progression-of-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-Illuminates-the-origin-and-progression-of-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4abf96ae-2d49-4137-8551-37acbd3b136a Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:24:54 -0400 Study illuminates the origin and progression of bladder cancer
研究揭示MX蛋白对抗HIV-1和单纯疱疹病毒的机制VIB-UGent 医学生物技术中心的 Xavier Saelens 和 Sven Eyckerman 领导的一组研究人员发现，与人类免疫系统相关的蛋白质如何通过在细胞中组装引诱结构来抵御 HIV-1 和单纯疱疹病毒 1。这些病毒，然后捕获它们，甚至将它们分解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-uncovers-mechanism-of-MX- Protein-in-fighting-HIV-1-and-herpes-simplex-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-uncovers-mechanism-of-MX- Protein-in-fighting-HIV-1-and-herpes-simplex-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=073eb264-ace5-4af9-934a-42a1da4d5a07 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:21:36 -0400 Study uncovers mechanism of MX protein in fighting HIV-1 and herpes simplex virus
第一张海马体和前额皮质 DNA 修饰图谱创建加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的一项研究对人类大脑发育过程中基因调控的演变提供了前所未有的视角，展示了染色质的 3D 结构如何——； DNA 和蛋白质 -;起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/First-map-of-DNA-modification-in-the-hippocampus-and-prefrontal-cortex-created.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/First-map-of-DNA-modification-in-the-hippocampus-and-prefrontal-cortex-created.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b424329-ac6c-4120-b9f6-14dbdc70f991 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:13:36 -0400 First map of DNA modification in the hippocampus and prefrontal cortex created
研究人员发现三阴性乳腺癌的潜在治疗方法三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 仍然是最具侵袭性和致命性的乳腺癌类型，但麻省总医院布莱根妇女医院 (麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员) 癌症研究人员的新发现为治疗策略指明了方向，未来将在临床试验中进行检验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Researchers-discover-pottial-therapeutic-approach-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Researchers-discover-pottial-therapeutic-approach-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddd68dbc-3c22-4fb0-b11a-d7a936fe9d61 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:09:02 -0400 Researchers discover potential therapeutic approach for triple negative breast cancer
双免疫疗法加化疗为特定肺癌患者带来希望德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员证明，携带 STK11 和/或 KEAP1 肿瘤抑制基因特定突变的转移性非鳞状非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者更有可能从添加免疫疗法中受益tremelimumab 与 durvalumab 联合化疗，以克服该患者群体中常见的治疗耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Dual-immunotherapy-plus-chemotherapy-shows-promise-for-specific-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Dual-immunotherapy-plus-chemotherapy-shows-promise-for-specific-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=924e0dec-06ee-4b21-8f5c-e74c321cdbcb Wed, 09 Oct 2024 22:04:27 -0400 Dual immunotherapy plus chemotherapy shows promise for specific lung cancer patients
新评论探索寨卡病毒作为脑癌的潜在治疗方法2024 年 9 月 30 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新综述，题为“寨卡病毒和脑癌：寨卡病毒能否有效治疗脑癌？系统综述”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-review-explores-Zika-virus-as-a-pottial-treatment-for-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-review-explores-Zika-virus-as-a-pottial-treatment-for-brain-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d03e41f3-b006-44d4-b368-3fa04ae5d6ae Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:59:55 -0400 New review explores Zika virus as a potential treatment for brain cancer
研究人员揭示了人类气味感知的神经机制我们常常只有在嗅觉不再存在时才意识到它有多么重要：食物很难吃，或者我们不再对烟味等危险做出反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/AResearchers-uncover-neuronal-mechanisms-of- human-odor-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/AResearchers-uncover-neuronal-mechanisms-of- human-odor-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e1ab467-3319-49a0-ad21-bccbe74c8566 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 21:51:32 -0400 AResearchers uncover neuronal mechanisms of human odor perception
